Our podcast is up @UN exhibition site! I had the *incredible* privilege of interviewing Drs. @UREssien & @uche_blackstock on #racisminmedicine, the #covid19 #vaccine rollout, & promoting #healthequity at this critical time. #CovidVaccine #antiracism
